cause.description:
Basically, our mission statement explains it all. Technically, this was made a reality by the other Laura, but resulting from the fact that she doesn't have a facebook, here's the best I can do. I think that what Laura started is an excellent cause, and something that should be done not just in one area, but all over the country. So many people talk about helping others like this, but few do what she did to actually make it happen. Everyone can make a difference, even if it's just by getting something like this started in your town.
1. Happiness is a universal right.
2. Every little thing counts.
cause.mission: provide free camp-style fun for children who have witnessed, or been victims of domestic abuse.
cause.name: Summer Camp For the Children of Domestic Abuse
